Title: Friends & Lovers
Plot: Grissom and Warrick take the case of a young man who is found naked in the desert without an obvious cause of death. Sara gets to find out why the body of a woman who was buried the previous week is now in a dumpster. Catherine and Nick investigate the killing of a school's dean.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual themes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Kelly Connell, Milo Ventimiglia, Amy Carlson, Elena Lyons, Jeff Parise, Timothy Landfield, Paul Terrell Clayton, Mark Collver, Tom Beyer, Mike Greybeal, Elkin Antoniou, Susan Santiago, Mike Greybeal
